entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump JUNE 1st America needs leadership.
This NOVEMBER 3RD tweet just told us EVERYTHING about you.
Your not concerned about covid-19 
Your not concerned about deaths of innocent Black lives
Your not concerned about 102,000 American citizen's no longer with us
U ONLY CARE ABOUT YOU
